reviewText: This was my fault. The DVD I ordered can't be played in my area. So I sent it back and asked for one that could be played here, or another series. Series 7-8 to be exact. Thanks for your help. I haven't heard back
it is a good series of devious men and women.

Again, I love this series. I love the characters, and, as I am nearing my own retirement and love to walk, I get itchy feet while watching the series: I want to roam, natter, and get into goofy scrapes. What a lovely life.

The adventures of Compo, Cleggy, and whoever the third man is at the time, are always delightful. My mother's a huge fan of the show, and I've been slowly getting her all the series on DVD. She does so adore her "old men". It's a shame that Foggy left, though. He'll always be my favourite third man.
